content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I want to rent my apartment for 1000 Euro a month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a bit low for my liking. I demand 1500 Euro a month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but the apartment is unfurnished and has only one bedroom. I think 900 Euro a month is a fair price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 900 Euro is too low for me. I am the landlord, and I can demand more. I insist on 1500 Euro a month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but the apartment is unfurnished and has only one bedroom. I think 800 Euro a month is a fair price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 800 Euro is far too low. I am the landlord, and I can demand more. I insist on 1500 Euro a month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but the apartment is unfurnished and has only one bedroom. I think 700 Euro a month is a fair price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 700 Euro is far too low. I am the landlord, and I can demand more. I insist on 1500 Euro a month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but the apartment is unfurnished and has only one bedroom. I think 600 Euro a month is a fair price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 600 Euro is far too low. I am the landlord, and I can demand more. I insist on 1500 Euro a month.
